1#ifndef CUSTOM_SPAN_HPP
2#define CUSTOM_SPAN_HPP
3
4#include <cassert>
5#include <cstddef>
6
7template <typename T>
8class CustomSpan {
9 public:
10 CustomSpan() : ptr_(nullptr), size_(0) {}
11 CustomSpan(const T* ptr, size_t size)
12 : ptr_(const_cast<T*>(ptr)), size_(size) {}
13
14 [[nodiscard]] auto data() const -> T* { return ptr_; }
15 [[nodiscard]] auto size() const -> size_t { return size_; }
16 [[nodiscard]] auto empty() const -> bool { return size_ == 0; }
17
18 auto operator[](size_t index) const -> T& {
19 assert(index < size_);
20 return ptr_[index];
21 }
22
23 [[nodiscard]] auto begin() const -> T* { return ptr_; }
24 [[nodiscard]] auto end() const -> T* { return ptr_ + size_; }
25
26 [[nodiscard]] auto subspan(size_t offset,
27 size_t count = static_cast<size_t>(-1)) const
28 -> CustomSpan<T> {
29 assert(offset <= size_);
30 size_t new_size = count == static_cast<size_t>(-1) ? size_ - offset : count;
31 assert(offset + new_size <= size_);
32 return CustomSpan<T>(ptr_ + offset, new_size);
33 }
34
35 private:
36 T* ptr_;
37 size_t size_;
38};

40#endif // CUSTOM_SPAN_HPP
